title: The Big Lie’s (Hilarious) Day In Court, Mario 64 Sells For 1.5 Million 7.15.21
itunes:title: The Big Lie’s (Hilarious) Day In Court, Mario 64 Sells For 1.5 Million 7.15.21
description:
In episode 951, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Sara June to discuss the Democrats Voting Rights bill, the Kraken lawsuits, Ron Desantis' anti-Fauci merch, an unopened N64 copy of Super Mario 64 selling for over $1.5 million, Sha'Carri Richardson getting a big vape endorsement offer, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. The Democrats’ Voting Rights Bill Is Dead
  2. The Memo: On voting, public has a more nuanced view than partisans
  3. All You Need To Know About Monday's Kraken Lawyer Hearing Is That One Of Them Started Crying
  4. Judge suggests ‘Kraken’ lawsuits were meant to ‘make the public believe’ Trump’s false election claims
  5. DeSantis campaign merch targets Fauci, facemasks
  6. Featured Products
  7. It’s-a Me, a $1.56 Million Copy of Super Mario 64!
  8. SHA'CARRI RICHARDSON OFFERED $250K GIG WITH VAPE CO. … Test Our Product!!!
  9. LISTEN NOW: Moving Up - Mr. Miltch

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
